description: This file implements the basic container object functions for a Trace Route Diagnostic Tdo object within the Broadband Home Manager Model. It includes functions for creating, removing, enrolling objects, and initializing the Tdo object, along with associated object lifecycle management.

classes.name: BBHM_TRACERT_TDO_OBJECT
classes.description: The main object representing the Trace Route Diagnostic Tdo instance, encapsulating properties like TimerType, Interval, Counter, and methods for invoking and configuring the diagnostic process.

methods.name: ANSC_HANDLE BbhmDiagitTdoCreate(ANSC_HANDLE hContainerContext,ANSC_HANDLE hOwnerContext,ANSC_HANDLE hAnscReserved)
methods.description: Creates and initializes an instance of the Tdo object, setting its name, identifiers, and function pointers.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS BbhmDiagitTdoRemove(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject)
methods.description: Destroys the Tdo object and performs cleanup.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS BbhmDiagitTdoEnrollObjects(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject)
methods.description: Enrolls all sub-objects required by the Tdo object.

methods.name: ANSC_STATUS BbhmDiagitTdoInitialize(ANSC_HANDLE hThisObject)
methods.description: Initializes the Tdo object, setting default values for its properties.
